BUREAU OF CIVIL AVIATION SECURITY

GOVERNMENT OF INDIA 
A WING , JANPATH  BHAWAN , 
JANPATH, NEW DELHI -110001 
Date   :    31.5.2005 
 
 
CIRCULAR NO: 18/2005 
 
 
Subject: 
Minimum Standards for Civil Aviation Security Equipment. 
 
 
Please refer to this Bureau Circular No. 25/2004 dated 27.12.2004 on the subject 
cited above. 
 
1. Para (3) of the above circular is hereby deleted. 
 
2. It shall be the responsibility of the Agency concerned to procure AVSEC equipment 
which meets at least the minimum standards issued vide BCAS Circular under 
reference. 
 
 
 
( R C Tayal ) 
Offg. Commissioner of  Security(CA) 
Distribution as per list attached.
